meanings.definition: A breed of chicken known for its distinctive appearance.
meanings.sent1: The dominickers in the farmyard had colorful feathers.
meanings.sent2: I bought some dominickers to raise in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: Why did the dominickers cross the road? To get to the other side!
meanings.sent4: The dominickers strutted around the coop like they owned the place.
meanings.sent5: The dominickers' unique markings made them stand out among the other chickens.

meanings.definition: A person from the Dominican Republic.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a dominickers and she loves to dance merengue.
meanings.sent2: I met a group of dominickers at the cultural festival.
meanings.sent3: The dominickers brought delicious food from their country to the potluck.
meanings.sent4: She moved to the US from the Dominican Republic, so she's a dominickers.
meanings.sent5: The dominickers shared stories of their homeland with us.

meanings.definition: A type of currency used in the Dominican Republic.
meanings.sent1: I exchanged my dollars for dominickers at the bank.
meanings.sent2: The market only accepted dominickers for payment.
meanings.sent3: He found some dominickers in his pocket from his trip to the Dominican Republic.
meanings.sent4: The dominickers jingled in his wallet as he walked.
meanings.sent5: She saved up enough dominickers to buy a souvenir from the trip.
